Jürgen Klopp believes Daniel Sturridge is ready to make a rare start for Liverpool in their crucial visit to West Ham United on Sunday.

Klopp: "I was happy to have the opportunity to bring Daniel on the pitch. Top players have impact. Now the situation is different again."

Klopp: "It’s another week we’ve had Daniel training and so far so good, so hopefully we have a few options."

Klopp: "Daniel - If he had not been fit it would not have been possible. That is unfortunately how it is. He needs a physical situation."

Klopp: I’ve never had a doubt over Daniel Sturridge at Liverpool.

æ’ç‰™å¹¾å¤§åˆ†åˆ¥ä¸‹

Klopp: "For me, there was not a second of doubt about Sturridge. For all of us, it was unlucky at important moments he was not available."

Klopp: "That was not his fault. It was not my fault. It was only the situation."

Klopp on Sturridge: "I only think about now at this moment and I trust him 100%. He’s an instinctive footballer and a fantastic striker."

Klopp: "It’s good news he’s now available. Three or four weeks ago, I was not sure it would happen. Now he’s there, and that’s all good."

Klopp on Sturridge: "At this moment, he looks really good. Yesterday, good. The day before, training was good. Will he start? We’ll see."

Klopp believes moving Philippe Coutinho into a central midfield position would increase his ability to pull the strings for Liverpool.

Klopp: "That is possible & then maybe he will have more influence & we can involve another player on the wing. That would make us stronger."

Klopp: "Having his creativity - he would have to adapt. He is young, full of talent & I’m pretty sure he thinks he is in the right place.”

Klopp on Coutinho: "He became the player he is at Liverpool. He really likes being here and his family really likes it too."

Klopp: "We all believe in this project. We all want to be part of it. It is a fantastic club in a good situation, not perfect, but good."

Jurgen Klopp admits he wants his transfer business done quickly this summer. He is keen to have his squad in place before August 12th.

Klopp on transfers: "If you ask me as a private person, ASAP. But I’m long enough in the business to know that’s only kind of a dream."

Klopp: "We will tell you when we are finished. It’s probably really likely that we will have to do a lot of things during our holiday."

Klopp: "That’s how it is, maybe in the pre-season, I don’t know. We have to see. That depends on who you can get and when."

Klopp: "Different things can happen. That’s how it is, and we have to react."

Klopp on transfers: "I would think the better we finish, maybe the easier it would be. There are always other teams. We have to go in."

Klopp: "One of these is probably the tournaments we play in next year. Three of them are sure, one is not sure. That’s all."
